author: Gabrielle Reyes, Gabrielle Reyes
title: India: Police Use Tear Gas to Disperse Crowds of Hundreds Defying Lockdown
description: Police in Surat, India, used tear gas to disperse migrant workers defying the coronavirus lockdown on Sunday, as hundreds of thousands of jobless people flee big cities for the countryside.
content:
Police in Surat, India, used tear gas to disperse migrant workers defying the coronavirus lockdown on Sunday, as hundreds of thousands of jobless people flee big cities for the countryside.
